item.title: Poltergeist
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

So coming back to this thread… I’d have to say, I wouldn’t recommend the movie to anyone. I mean, it honestly felt like from them trying to make it a horror to the damn Matrix. Simply put, them doing this whole dimension thing is from Insidious (perhaps others have had the idea - I’m sure, but that’s the best example that comes to mind) to them doing this whole thing with computers and stuff. I really didn’t like the idea of the movie after I watched it and it was most definitely not scary nor was it entertaining.

Read full topic

item.title: Poltergeist
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

[B]These are my ratings/[/B]
Rating: 6/10
Acting Rating: 7/10
Acting Review: I didn’t like the acting of the parents, they’re always dumb and reckless like every other scary movie.
Overall Review: It wasn’t really scary, only a few (3 or 4) jump scare moments. There was one scene where a guy loses his drill, through a hole, and he puts his arm in there… Like really, can we stop with the stupidity.

Read full topic

item.title: Poltergeist
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I saw this last night. Quite disappointing tbh.

They tried to include lots of special effects and futuristic-like paranormal encounters but it didn’t really work… It has some nice effects and a few jump scenes, but you can predict them way off and overall it just didn’t work for a scary movie.

Worth a watch and it’s nice to see some modern stuff included too.

Read full topic

item.title: Poltergeist
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I like the idea of the movie but whether or not the movie will be able to perform the act of the concept of the movie is another story. I’m not really putting too much faith in horror movies nowadays, they’ve all disappointed me. Insidious though (for example - calm down, for those who thought it was dumb) wasn’t that bad. Otherwise, I suppose I’ll have to wait and see.

Read full topic
